Class Collection

  • java.lang.Object
    • Collection

  • public class Collection
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to hold DVD collection.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Collection()
      Constructor for Collection.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void displayDetails()
      Displays details of all DVDs in collection.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      Main method for class.
      void menu()
      Displays an in-console menu with four options: -Display all DVDs -Search DVDs -Display total value -Display total runtime
      void searchCollection()
      Allows a user to search the collection from the console.
      void setAll()
      Sets values of all three DVD's in collection.
      int totalRunTime()
      Calculates the total runtime of the collection in minutes.
      float totalValue()
      Calculates the total value of the collection in pounds.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Collection

        public Collection()
        Constructor for Collection. Creates three DVD's: -Star Wars Episode IV -Ferris Bueller's Day Off -The Dark Knight

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main method for class. Creates a new collection and sets the details of every DVD. Displays details of all DVDs. Calls searchCollection. Contains commented-out test code.
        Parameters:
        args - args.

      • setAll

        public void setAll()
        Sets values of all three DVD's in collection.

        public void displayDetails()
        Displays details of all DVDs in collection.

      • searchCollection

        public void searchCollection()
        Allows a user to search the collection from the console.

        public float totalValue()
        Calculates the total value of the collection in pounds.
        Returns:
        float with the total value.

      • totalRunTime

        public int totalRunTime()
        Calculates the total runtime of the collection in minutes.
        Returns:
        int of total runtime.

      • menu

        public void menu()
        Displays an in-console menu with four options: -Display all DVDs -Search DVDs -Display total value -Display total runtime
